Row.Text: ...I see. Even after committing the ultimate sin and becoming a being beyond Magical Girl or Witch, this is still the outcome. No matter how powerful I get, the universe...the universe -- fate -- will find a way to make me fail.[NEWLINE]After all this time...so much time...I...*sniff*...I think it's time...time to finally give up. Madoka...I'm sorry, but...*sniff*...I wasn't strong enough to beat the will of the universe by myself...[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR:180:180:180:255](She breaks down in tears as her Dark Orb crumbles to ash.)[ENDCOLOR]

Hmm. A world leader, you say? I don't have much time for world leaders. But let me ask you a question, regardless. What do you believe is the strongest emotion a human has? Your answer will determine whether or not we shall be enemies.

I imagine you didn't expect for your scouts to find the Devil out here. Hmm? You expected the Devil to be a bit uglier, you say? Your flattery won't get you anywhere. Just continue placating your people and making sure nobody ever has to save them. I might even help you a little with that. Don't take that as a gesture of friendship, though.
I don't have time for this. I'll put an end to this little scuffle quickly.
I don't have time for this. I'll put an end to this little scuffle quickly.

Ah, is that so? I'm actually quite happy to hear that. You've been a cancerous growth in this world I've tried so hard to build for Madoka. Now that you are the aggressor, that little bit of a conscience I still have for others can be satisfied even if I kill you.

Ah, is that so? I'm actually quite happy to hear that. You've been a cancerous growth in this world I've tried so hard to build for Madoka. Now that you are the aggressor, that little bit of a conscience I still have for others can be satisfied even if I kill you.

Do you believe that you've caught me at a weak spot? Indeed, you hold the advantage in numbers. But never underestimate the power of an angry devil powered by the most powerful emotion known to humans.

Do you believe that you've caught me at a weak spot? Indeed, you hold the advantage in numbers. But never underestimate the power of an angry devil powered by the most powerful emotion known to humans.
Your armies outnumber my familiars. So, does that give you the sense that you have more power than me? How cute. I'll prove you wrong in short order.
Your armies outnumber my familiars. So, does that give you the sense that you have more power than me? How cute. I'll prove you wrong in short order.
Ridiculous. You think you can kill the Devil with your weapons? I have more important things to do in my world, so I'm going to make sure this doesn't last long.
Ridiculous. You think you can kill the Devil with your weapons? I have more important things to do in my world, so I'm going to make sure this doesn't last long.
...hehe.[NEWLINE]Ha, hahahahahahahaha!
...hehe.[NEWLINE]Ha, hahahahahahahaha!
You've done a good job helping to keep this world safe and secure for Madoka. Ensure it stays that way.
Hm? And what is it that you want from me?
Know that you've just walked straight into the pit of Hell by coming to see me. Does that scare you? It should.
Your people are about to be freed from your rule. Only I can ensure their happiness so that Madoka will never have to save them! This is the power of the ultimate emotion that a person can ever feel!
Your people are about to be freed from your rule. Only I can ensure their happiness so that Madoka will never have to save them! This is the power of the ultimate emotion that a person can ever feel!
I'm tired of allowing you to pretend that you have any power in this world. Come, face the embodiment of evil. Perhaps some sort of salvation will await you on the other side? Heheheh...
I'm tired of allowing you to pretend that you have any power in this world. Come, face the embodiment of evil. Perhaps some sort of salvation will await you on the other side? Heheheh...

There is only one friend I will ever have in this world, and I will even fight that friend if it means ensuring her safety. If you truly had any trust in a demon, you are more foolish than I could have ever thought possible.

There is only one friend I will ever have in this world, and I will even fight that friend if it means ensuring her safety. If you truly had any trust in a demon, you are more foolish than I could have ever thought possible.
...for the record, I agree with you. I am indeed evil. A devil.[NEWLINE]But, don't think that means there won't be retaliation coming for this. Major retaliation.
...for the record, I agree with you. I am indeed evil. A devil.[NEWLINE]But, don't think that means there won't be retaliation coming for this. Major retaliation.

The most effective prison is the one in which your captive cannot see any bars. Having chosen the path of Freedom as I have, no doubt you agree. Keeping our populaces blissfully ignorant and occupied with silly diversions will not only keep them out of harm's way, but will also prevent us from appearing to be oppressors. A perfect situation to keep Madoka where I need her to be. I suppose you have my support.

Keeping the world's power in the hands of its common people is a horrible idea. And yet, the two of us have declared our adherence to the tenets of Order. Fortunately, I believe we both know that it is only rhetoric. If we continue to pull the wool over their eyes, they'll never know how little they actually own or control. And they'll never call on Madoka for help as a result.

Pure power. Whether it grows from love, like mine, or from the force of your arms, like you...power is the most important tool to maintain stability and peace. It appears our ideas on how to keep this world safe through Autocracy have aligned. But don't let your growing might get to your head. If the only reason you have chosen this path is to claim dominion over the world, you'll have to go through me first.
Have you felt the devil's despair? Your soldiers have. Your citizens have. Submit to me and I may be merciful.
The Incubators have submitted to me wholly. It is far past time you followed suit.

Not that I am very concerned about the petty political machinations of your nations, but your proposal to the {1_LeagueName} seems to be aligned with my goals. I suppose you are owed a small token of gratitude.
Do you truly wish for me to visit the {1_LeagueName} so that I may shoot down that moronic proposal you made? I should warn you that I do not resolve matters like this with mere voting.

My plan is to be enacted by the {1_LeagueName}. A single step closer to ensuring a perfect world for Madoka. I will remember your support. Though it appears your approval ratings seem to be dropping, what with voting in favor of the devil and all. That's not an issue, is it?
My plans for the {1_LeagueName} were halted by your hands. You do realize what the next logical step is if diplomacy fails to work, correct?

You've helped to put the devil herself in charge of the {1_LeagueName}, the world's congress. I seem to remember hearing about such a thing in Christianity signalling that the end of days is near...well, at any rate, you have my gratitude, but the media is saying some quite obscene and blasphemous things about you as a result. Perhaps I will help you silence them, if I find the time.
Oh, how droll. The {@1_CivAdjective} fools believe they can oppose me. Well, I suppose I can spare some time to attend to them. I'll invite you to watch their punishment when the time comes.
So, are you enjoying the gift of the knowledge you stole from me? Perhaps I should throw in the knowledge of the abject fear of death as a complementary gift?
I suppose I haven't much room to complain about underhanded tactics like theft of information. However, it would be wise for you to stop doing it immediately.
Good decision.
Well, then. I suppose I'll need to place curses upon all of my books and records.
Hmmh...fine. I have no shortage of other places from which my familiars can gather information.
I will continue to invade your information networks with my familiars, and there is nothing you will do about it.
I suppose you're here to complain about my information gathering familiars.
You have magic capable of containing the boundaries of my realm...? How can that be possible?! You...you will pay dearly for this.
Those creatures you saved are worth less than cockroaches. But I suppose I can appreciate the gesture.
Good decision.
A wise call.
Good.
I suppose I must thank you.
Excellent. Know that you are helping keep the world the way it should be.
...hmph.
(sigh)
Hrmm.

...well. Me, being betrayed...I suppose this is karma. I have no right to be mad at you for it, considering what I've done. However, I am. Very much so. And you will feel that anger when I torture you to the breaking point of your sanity.
Until my Realm, my Barrier has covered every inch of this world and every other world, I will tear apart any who stand in my way. Die!
I had plans for this moment, but I absolutely cannot pass up the opportunity offered to me right now to take down a thorn in my side like you.
How flattering. Are you perhaps trying to curry favor with me?
Fine.
The deal is done.
Have you lost your mind?
I have no more time for bargaining, so fine -- I'll accept that.
Well?
There it is -- your deal with the devil.
That's not worthy of my time.
I don't suppose you'd like to deal with me a second time?

Now that I look at this deal, I feel I must have been overburdened with thoughts of all of my duties to keep this world safe for her, and accepted something ludicrous. It won't happen a second time. Now, don't you think we can make this a little better?

My Clara Dolls are bored and find their entertainment in pelting me with tomatoes. I'm pressed for time, so I am willing to trade with you for that commodity instead of taking it like I want to. Perhaps that will give them something with which to entertain themselves.
Care to make an offering to the devil? It may save your life.
Gott ist Tot.
If your rampages cause Madoka to reawaken, then so help me, what I will do to you will make the Hells of all of the world's religions seem like paradise in comparison.
Perhaps...perhaps even a deity can be outclassed. Very well -- you have my respect, for now.
